name: Fight Arena
Start point: Lady Servil, southeast of the gnome battlefield, northwest edge of the arena camp.
Description: The Servil family has been broken up by the evil General Khazard. Reunite the family and ultimately defeat the General.

Requirements.Combat requirements: Ability to defeat multiple high-level enemies including level 132 Bouncer and level 112 General Khazard

substeps: Talk to Lady Servil near the Fight Arena entrance (north-west of the camp, south-east of the Gnome Stronghold battlefield).
Agree to help rescue her family.
Head east into the Fight Arena camp.
Enter the most northeastern house.
Open the chest and take the Khazard armour (helmet and platebody).
Equip the armour.
Go south into the prison building.
The guard will let you in because you are wearing the armour.
Talk to Jeremy Servil through his cell door. He'll tell you the guard has the keys.
Enter the southeast corner room of the prison building.
Talk to the Prison Guard. He mentions Khali brew makes him sleepy.
Go west to the tavern within the camp.
Take a Khali brew from the table.
Return to the Prison Guard and talk to him again.
He will take the brew, get drunk, and give you the cell keys.
Use the cell keys on Jeremy's cell door.
A cutscene will play where you and Jeremy attempt to escape but are forced into the arena.
Defeat the Khazard Ogre (level 55) to save Justin Servil.
After the fight, General Khazard will capture you.
You will appear in a jail cell. Talk to Hengrad.
You will be taken out to fight again.
Defeat the Khazard Scorpion (level 44).
Defeat Bouncer (level 132). Tip: Use the carcass on the west side of the arena scaffold as a safespot.
Defeat General Khazard (level 112).
After defeating General Khazard, talk to one of the Servils.
Return to Lady Servil outside the camp to claim your reward.
